question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a God who created the universe and has since interacted with His creation"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not believe in deities or a higher power of any kind"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The universe exists entirely on its own and there is no God or any other supernatural power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not believe in any god or supreme being"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not believe in the existence of any gods or supernatural beings"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not believe there is sufficient evidence to show a god of any sort exists"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"God is real and had a hand in creating the universe and our planet"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a God or supreme divinity"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is no God or Universal Spirit"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a God who created us in the universe"

"I believe that there is a God who created and rules the universe"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"God exists and takes an interest in our lives"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is a God who created and rules the world"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"God has or will at some time interact with humanity, answering prayers or demonstrating awareness of human affairs in some tangible way"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"God exists and wants a personal relationship with me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there exists a personal, transcendent God who created the universe"

Is the following statement something you would say?

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not believe in any gods, supernatural beings, or forces"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a god or supernatural deity"

"I believe in the existence of at least one God"

"The Bible is of divine origin"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is a God that created the Universe"

Is the following statement something you would say?

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that God created the universe and all living things"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not believe that there is a supernatural God or any type of supreme deity"
